p: With regard to the distillation tests ( Table 1), the significant differences found between the average yields comparing the two collection periods within the same species, with the exception of Cistus ladanifer and Pinus sylvestris, could be explained by the differences in the plants due to different factors, such as their phenological stage, meteorological conditions or plant age, as other authors have observed in previous studies with these species and others [ 17, 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, 33].
